thread.title: Tom Izzo rips ESPN's Dan Dakich for Michigan State comments
thread.title_full: Tom Izzo rips ESPN's Dan Dakich for Michigan State comments

author: Joe Rodgers (joseph.rodgers@peformgroup.com)
title: Tom Izzo rips ESPN's Dan Dakich for Michigan State comments
text:
— Hunter Maniez (@HManiezz) February 15, 2017 
As you can imagine, the comments quickly spread throughout the Michigan State student section. During Ohio State free throws, Spartans fans chanted, "We hate Dakich!" instead of trying to distract Buckeyes shooters. Dan Dakich enjoying the boos pic.twitter.com/RJ7J2CdwJ4 — Carlos Marinez (@msu984) February 15, 2017 
That caught Izzo's attention. 
"I was kind of getting upset at the chants of ‘Dakich.’ Until I got into the locker room and somebody read me his tweets," Izzo told reporters after the 74-66 win. "If I would have known that before the game, I would have embarrassed myself almost as much as he embarrassed himself. And I would have led the chants. 
“Calling us whiners and that is kind of unprofessional. But saying our students couldn’t get in there? And he’s doing games for Michigan when his son’s there? That is a disappointment and that is ridiculous. 
“Danny owes our fans and our students an apology.” Watch This
